page.title: 13CLUBS PAGE TWO
page.content:
I go to the Boys Brigade.When we get there we have to fall in.I am a group leader.We play games.These are the games we play.Pursuit,Pirates,Bulldogs, and team games.I enjoy going there. Most of my friends go to Boys Brigade they enjoy it too.We play football against other Boys Brigades.We have superstars competitions and swimming competitions
I go to Rolls Royce swimming club. We use the West Craven swimming pool. You have to buy a membership card which lasts you a year and costs about five pounds. There are 2 classes one at 7.30pm-8.00pm and one at 8.00pm-8.30pm. I am in the one at 8.00pm-8.30pm in the group with the 13,14 and 15 years olds. I am 11, and it is hard for me.
